    • Method Detail

      • applyRule

        protected void applyRule(AbstractTripleStore db,
                         IRule rule,

      • applyRule

        protected void applyRule(AbstractTripleStore db,
                         IRule rule,
                         IElementFilter<ISPO> filter,
                         long expectedSolutionCount,
                         long expectedMutationCount)
                  throws Exception
        Applies the rule, copies the new entailments into the store and checks the expected #of inferences computed and new statements copied into the store.

        Invoke as applyRule( store.{rule}, ..., ... )

        Parameters:
        rule - The rule, which must be one of those found on the triple store or otherwise configured so as to run with the triple store instance.
        expectedSolutionCount - The #of entailments that should be computed by the rule (tested during Query) or -1 if the #of solutions that will be computed is not known.
        expectedMutationCount - The #of new elements that should have been inserted into the db by the rule.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • assertSameSolutionsAnyOrder

        protected void assertSameSolutionsAnyOrder(IChunkedOrderedIterator<ISolution> itr,
                                           IBindingSet[] expected)
        Verifies the the iterator visits ISolutions have the expected IBindingSets when those bindings may occur in any order.
        Parameters:
        itr - The iterator.
        expected - The expected IBindingSets.
